import React from "react"; import './PopupErrorStyle.css'; import { Modal, ModalOverlay, ModalContent, ModalHeader, ModalFooter, ModalBody, ModalCloseButton, } from '@chakra-ui/react' const PopupError = () => { const { isOpen, onOpen, onClose } = useDisclosure(); return ( Modal Title /*

Error!

An issue occurred with user authentication.

*/ ); } export default PopupError;
